def_cn: 精彩描写;小品文;精彩片断
def_en: A cameo is a short description or piece of acting which expresses cleverly and neatly the nature of a situation, event, or person's character.

def_cn: (通常为椭圆形的)多彩浮雕首饰
def_en: A cameo is a piece of jewellery, usually oval in shape, consisting of a raised stone figure or design fixed on to a flat stone of another colour.
